name: Math Jump
description:
Math Jump - Jump up but don't forget the Math!

Chase the highscore in this amazing addictive endless jumper video game.
How high can you jump?

Addicting Gameplay

Easy and addicting gameplay in this amazing doodled math theme endless jumper video game. Just tap the left or right side of the screen to jump from platform to platform. But watch out, the grey platforms will disappear after a short time if you step on it so jump fast to the next platform! The red platforms will subtract life points and the blue platforms will add life points. On the green platforms you can rest to plan the next jumps. Have fun with Math Jump and beat the highscore!

Supported Languages:
  • English
  • Deutsch
  • Español
  • Français
Play Offline

Do you want to play Math Jump whenever and wherever you want?
The mobile version does not require an internet connection.
